alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 5:09AM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Jackson County, especially the southern end of the Rogue Valley as well as the Cascade Foothills. This includes Interstate 5 from Siskiyou Summit to Medford and portions of Highway 140. This also includes the cities of Medford, Central Point, Talent, Phoenix and Ashland. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
